name: boba-smores
description: the best ITP project team ever made in eternati

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "(cd web && npm start)" "(cd backend && npm run dev)"
scripts.setup: npm i && cd web && npm i && cd ../backend && npm i
